resources.string: Hi. My name is Pavel, and at the moment i live, study and work in St. Petersburg, as a graduate student of the second year of study at the St. Petersburg State University of Telecommunications. prof. Bonch-Bruyevich the department of communication networks. By nature I am a punctual, organized, ambitious and cheerful young man who is always open to new ideas and people. The highest my interest associated with the use of innovative positioning systems, data processing and communication in the field of transport. The topic of my dissertation is also associated transport, namely the development of a wireless network for vehicles VANET - (Vehicular Ad hoc Network). Name of the dissertation topic - Development and research models to ensure quality of service in networks VANET. Previously, I studied at the Russian State University of Innovative Technologies and Business. Due to the active life position many times was a member of various Russian and international conferences in the field of information and telecommunication technologies. There are also the publication of my research work in various Russian and international journals. Is a Fellow of the program of work on the topic UMNIK "Hardware-software system to ensure the safe movement of vehicles." During high school, showed leadership in the field of recreation, was president of the school.
Are you realy want to send the data?
